data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta
data.actual_result: It opens the chat with the user.
data.expected_result: It should open the user profile like other "normal" mentions.
data.short_description: Mentions in channel topics open the chat with the user instead of the user profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Add a channel topic to a channel containing a user mention (mention must be with the user ID) - Open the channel topic on the right side of the channel (doesn't work for channel settings) - Click on the mention
